price: Raja berkata, "Bawalah dia kepadaku".  Maka tatkala utusan itu datang kepada Yūsuf, berkatalah Yūsuf, "Kembalilah kepada tuanmu dan tanyakanlah kepadanya bagaimana halnya wanita-wanita yang telah melukai tangannya.  Sesungguhnya Tuhan-ku, Maha Mengetahui tipu daya mereka".
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِهِۦۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُ ٱلرَّسُولُ قَالَ ٱرۡجِعۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَسۡـَٔلۡهُ مَا بَالُ ٱلنِّسۡوَةِ ٱلَّٰتِي قَطَّعۡنَ أَيۡدِيَهُنَّۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي بِكَيۡدِهِنَّ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-maliku i'tūnī bihi falammā jāahu al-rasūlu qāla ir'jiʿ ilā rabbika fasalhu mā bālu al-nis'wati allātī qaṭṭaʿna aydiyahunna inna rabbī bikaydihinna ʿalīmun
